full_summary:
**Title (Titre)**
W6896-24SO82 - Auxiliary Power Unit (APU) Inspections, Maintenance, and Repair Standing Offer Request for Standing Offer
================================================================================================================

**Reg. #Badge Référence**: WS4426091252-Doc4495671897
**Amendment #[[Mod.]**: 0
**Publication Date**: 19 April 2024
**Closes**: 14 May 2024 at 14:00 (EDT)

**Procurement Type (Méthode Approvisionnement)**: Competitive - Open bidding (concurrence ouverte à soumissionner)

**Contracting Entity (Entité Contractante)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Location (Lieu)**: Winnipeg

**End User (Entité Utilisateur Finale)**: Department of National Defence (DND)

**Summary (Résumé)**

The Standing Offer Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the provision of skilled labour services to perform inspections, maintenance, and repairs on auxiliary power unit (APU) systems is now open. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing skilled labor, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials required to complete the tasks. The work will be performed for the Department of National Defence (DND) and will be called up as required.

**Additional Information (Informations Complémentaires)**

A mandatory electronic bid package is available in Ariba Discovery. Bidders are required to download and complete the package in order to be eligible. The deadline for submissions is 14 May 2024 at 14:00 (EDT). All late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information (Informations de Contact)**

For more information or to obtain the RSO document, please contact:

Matthew Keenan
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Attachments (Pièces Jointes)**

None
================================================================================================================

Supporting documentation:

APU (Systems)
------------------------------------------------

The work to be performed under this Standing Offer includes inspections, maintenance, and repairs on auxiliary power unit (APU) systems used by the Department of National Defence (DND) at Det Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba.
